channel.title: Music props
channel.description:
What I mean, basically, is the following. In Portal, we have this.
![](upload://v48u0GB8HZoVVeFyF5WLQcXrgic.jpeg)
It would be nice as a bonus for black mesa to feature some cheesy tunes throughout the game played back by some various situational gadgets. It's a nice way to add a human touch to the whole thing. Those devices could be for instance: - Radios lying around on desks - Elevator speakers - PA malfunction - A scientist playing a game on his computer - Car radio left on - Cellphone ringing
It's not a must and probably not worth the time, but I don't think it would take too long to implement either (provided that you guys haven't already done it). As for the music itself, I'm sure there are plenty of people here to help out, including me.
That being said, [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=J9C78b_FhKA#t=211s']the ultimate inspiration.[/url]
